text:
e="preserve">Sun Weiben (; 19 November 1928 – 18 December 2020) was a Chinese politician. He was Communist Party Secretary of Heilongjiang from 1985 to 1994 and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Heilongjiang People's Congress from 1988 to 1998.
He was a member of the 12th, 13th and 14th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party. He was a delegate to the 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th and 11th National People's Congress.
Sun died on 18 December 2020, almost one month after his 92nd birthday.

annotations.surface_form: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
